creditline: Gift of Martin Weinstein in memory of Ted Hartwell
inscription:
Inscription, Stamp and Label

on back, in pencil: [105027] and [28]; on back stamped in black: [American Photographs: Walker Evans/ Sept. 28, 1938-Oct. 29, 1938/ The Museum of Modern Art/ 14 West 49th St., New York] and [Photographed for The Museum of Modern Art/ by Soichi Sunami. If reproduced, credit/ must be given to The Museum of Modern Art.]; on back, on label: Walker Evans:/ WOODEN CHURCH, SOUTH CAROLINA, 1936/ From American photographs (underlined), The Museum of Modern Art, 1938/ (This print rephotographed from original)]
medium: Gelatin silver print (copy print made by the Museum of Modern Art, New York)
title: Wooden Church, South Carolina
